scripts.dev:standalone:css:main: sass src/form.scss | postcss --config postcss.config.json -u autoprefixer --no-map -o targets/standalone/happychat.css
scripts.dev:standalone:css:woo: sass src/ui/css/themes/_woo.scss | postcss --config postcss.config.json -u autoprefixer --no-map -o targets/standalone/woo.css
scripts.dev:standalone:css:jpop: sass src/ui/css/themes/_jpop.scss | postcss --config postcss.config.json -u autoprefixer --no-map -o targets/standalone/jpop.css

scripts.dev:npm:css:woo: sass src/ui/css/themes/_woo.scss | postcss --config postcss.config.json -u autoprefixer --no-map -o targets/npm/woo.css
scripts.dev:npm:css:jpop: sass src/ui/css/themes/_jpop.scss | postcss --config postcss.config.json -u autoprefixer --no-map -o targets/npm/jpop.css
scripts.dev:wordpress:css:main: sass src/form.scss | postcss --config postcss.config.json -u autoprefixer --no-map -o targets/wordpress/happychat.css
scripts.dev:wordpress:css:woo: sass src/ui/css/themes/_woo.scss | postcss --config postcss.config.json -u autoprefixer --no-map -o targets/wordpress/woo.css
scripts.dev:wordpress:css:jpop: sass src/ui/css/themes/_jpop.scss | postcss --config postcss.config.json -u autoprefixer --no-map -o targets/wordpress/jpop.css
scripts.dev:wordpress:serve-css: npm run dev:wordpress:css && NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --config webpack.wordpress.config.js
scripts.build:standalone:css:main: sass src/form.scss --style compressed | postcss --config postcss.config.json -u autoprefixer --no-map -o targets/standalone/happychat.css
scripts.build:standalone:css:woo: sass src/ui/css/themes/_woo.scss --style compressed | postcss --config postcss.config.json -u autoprefixer --no-map -o targets/standalone/woo.css

scripts.build:npm:css:woo: sass src/ui/css/themes/_woo.scss --style compressed | postcss --config postcss.config.json -u autoprefixer --no-map -o targets/npm/woo.css

scripts.build:wordpress:css:woo: sass src/ui/css/themes/_woo.scss --style compressed | postcss --config postcss.config.json -u autoprefixer --no-map -o targets/wordpress/widget/woo.css
